page.title: 13Shopping
page.content: Although Tean does have a small Co-op Supermarket, two butchers shops, a general grocers,a bakers, two newsagents,a D.I.Y. shop and a post office, most people travel to Cheadle or Stoke for their shopping needs. Cheadle was especially popular for food buying. Tean shops were generally used by elderly people or those without their own transport. The biggest complaint about shopping was the lack of specialised shops such as a Chemists, although there is a dispensary in the Surgery in Old Road.
